metadata.name: T h e    P i a n i s t
metadata.description:
The Pianist is about the lost connections, I will leave this as per your interpretations and feeling with which you connect with this craft/art.

"You sit , You wonder 
  Perplexed with Life 
  A moment of joy 
  A moment of sorrow 
  You find muse 
  Or become one "  
  -sigmax
